org.jpws.pwslib.order

Class OrderedListEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • org.jpws.pwslib.order.OrderedListEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class OrderedListEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
    Event issued for an OrderedListListener. The event can be related to a record (wrapper) whose position in a list is described by an index value.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
